title: Bootstrap Layout Utilities
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Controlling Layout

### Position
`.position-static`, `.position-relative`, `.position-absolute`, `.position-fixed`, `.position-sticky`.
Helpers: `.top-0`, `.start-0`, `.translate-middle`.

### Overflow
`.overflow-auto`, `.overflow-hidden`.

### Visibility
`.visible`, `.invisible` (Takes space but unseen).

examples.output: Badge positioned on the corner of the button.

exam_notes: Position utilities are powerful for overlaying elements.
Sticky top requires valid parent height.
summary: These utilities give you CSS positioning powers without writing custom CSS classes.
